I never felt alone, I was happy on my own. And who would ever know there was something missing.I guess I didn't see the possibility. It was waiting all the time but it never crossed my mind till you opened up my eyes. Now all I think about is you in my life, in my dreams, in my heart I know it's true that I belong with you. Because of you in my world, in my arms, I have everything and now I can't imagine what I'd do...without you I never thought that love could be such a curiosity. What attracted you to me was so unexpected. But it was waiting all the time and it never crossed my mind until you opened up my eyes. TDVC: done! LA: 11 more days SK: 16 more days

happy birthday..i hope that all your hopes and dreams come true this year...i pray for millions of blessings on you this year...i hope for a wonderful man who will love you and challenge you and cherish you....

Busy day today...busy but good :) 5:00am - wake up and get ready for morning prayer 5:30am - get to church...morning prayer 7:30am - come back home...but i'm not tired anymore... 9:00am - sleep comes...crawl back into bed... 1:00pm - wake up, shower aaaaah...refreshing 2:00pm - buy Jee's birthday present...buy food for Jee's party...go to Jee's housefor party 5:15pm - come back home to drive Vanessa to softball 9:00pm - harbourfront centre latin festival 11:00pm - distillery district jazz festival...but we're too late....SUCKS MAN!!! 12:30am - home sweet home... TDVC: chapter 74 LA: 13 more days SK: 18 more days reminder: call Wootek

It's 11:50 pm...my alarm just went off to call Jee to wish her a happy birthday...she turns a big old 26(?) in 10 minutes...yowsers...it's gonna be a big year for her and i'm so happy for her...marriage..moving to the States...marrying an American...becoming an American...crazy dude!! i can't imagine what is going through her head... as of now there's not much going through my head...i have a splitting headache...i've had it all day...at first i thought it was because i hadn't had coffee and that i had become dependant on caffeine again...but i don't think that's it...i got myself a Timmy's around 2 but it hasn't helped me one bit...at this point i just feel like i'm gonna barf...my head is pounding... oh yes...and my mom just called..she says i have to do the translation for the morning prayer service at church tomorrow...i'm too tired to complain about that now...i just said ok fine...i will do my best..if i mess up i mess up...but i know no matter what the parents will have something to say to me after...i'll just smile...and nod....mmmhmm...yes....ok thanks...haha i missed the prayer and fasting night at church today...i wanted to go...i hope it's going well...we really need a pastor...tonight's prayer and fasting night is to pray for a pastor for our English Ministry...oh boy oh boy...it would be great to have a pastor...but we've been doing incredibly well these last few months without one...praise God...our MTs are really stepping up...and so are other lay leaders in the church... so...the biggest thing in my day has been that i've been fully engrossed in the world of The DaVinci Code....amazing book...i'm on chapter 54...books on tape are great...i listened to it at work...in the car...at home...i can't stop...amajeeeeng if anyone wants to discuss it..let me know...i should be done by tomorrow...
